body_html:
I just hit this building pip for 1.0 on 10.12.3 - anaconda python 3.5

This worked for me
✔︎ Stack Overflow posts linked by @normanheckscher worked

I know I had to do that a while back but haven't had to do it for a while.

Then toward the end I hit #7227 and had to revert to bazel 0.4.3. And then it all worked.

body:
I just hit this building pip for 1.0 on 10.12.3 - anaconda python 3.5

This worked for me
✔︎ Stack Overflow posts linked by @normanheckscher worked

I know I had to do that a while back but haven't had to do it for a while.

Then toward the end I hit #7227 and had to revert to bazel 0.4.3.  And then it all worked.
